classes.lab7.data_manupulation package¶

Submodules¶

classes.lab7.data_manupulation.data_from_console module¶

Input Handling Module

This module provides functions for getting user input related to object names, colors, and recommendations.

classes.lab7.data_manupulation.data_from_console.get_color()[source]¶

Get a color from the user.

Returns: str: The color entered by the user.

classes.lab7.data_manupulation.data_from_console.get_name(obj)[source]¶

Get the name of an object from the user.

Parameters: obj (str): The name of the object.

Returns: str: The name entered by the user.

classes.lab7.data_manupulation.data_from_console.get_user_input_recommendations()[source]¶

Get user input for recommendations.

Returns: dict: A dictionary containing user input for genre, artist, and track recommendations.
